title: Objects of desire at the 2019 Rouleur Classic cycling show
text:
The 2019 Rouleur Classic LDN is the fifth edition of what is billed as the world’s finest cycling exhibition and this year’s may well be the best yet, for as well as featuring more than 50 brands showcasing the very best upmarket bicycles, clothing and accessories there is a stellar line-up of cycling “royalty” such as Sir Bradley Wiggins, three-times Tour de France winner Greg Lemond, Mark Cavendish and Lizzie Deignan.

It takes place at Victoria House, Bloomsbury, London from October 31 to November 2. Here are some of the highlights of what will be on display at this year’s show....

Pinarello Dogma F12 X-Light
